text: Marcel Schäfer (born 7 June 1984 in Aschaffenburg) is a former German footballer. == Career == Schäfer came to the youth teams of 1860 Munich when he was 16 years old. In 2003 he played his first and only Bundesliga match for Munich. After the 2003–04 Bundesliga season, 1860 Munich was relegated to the 2. Bundesliga. Schäfer played for Munich for three more years. In 2007 he went back to the Bundesliga and came to VfL Wolfsburg. They won their first German Championship in 2009. Schäfer plays for the German national football team since the year 2008. His first international match was against England on 19 November 2008. == Career statistics == Club performance League Cup Continental Total Club League Season Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Germany League DFB-Pokal Europe Total 1860 Munich Bundesliga 2003–04 1 0 0 0 — 1 0 2\.
